duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the execution of clinical study/studies according to global regulatory requirements and SOPs, and supporting clinical strategy.
Lead cross-functional Study Execution Team to ensure study goals are met, on time and within budget.
Organize and lead cross-functional study team meetings and ensure appropriate regional input for global or multinational studies.
Manage study budget, including Task Orders, Change Orders, invoice approval, and financial reconciliation process.
Collaborate with Strategic Partners, vendors, and Clinical Program Team to manage risks, issue management, and evaluation/selection of required vendors.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree, RN, or international equivalent required, Life Sciences preferred.
